info.author: Chakib Benziane
info.description:
tmpbrowse - Spawn browser sessions for testing
----------------------------------------------

This tool helps you spawn temporary browser sessions in a sandboxed user dir to securely test your web app without worrying about
clearing cache, extensions ... 

Installation
------------

Using pypi repository::

    $> pip install tmpbrowse

Forking this repo::

    $> python setup.py install


Usage
-----


TODO
----

- Better browser abstraction





CHANGELOG
=========

0.0.3
------------------

- we can use a custom browser binary with --browser-bin argument
info.keywords: tmpbrowse browser chrome session test web development

tmpbrowse - Spawn browser sessions for testing

This tool helps you spawn temporary browser sessions in a sandboxed user dir to securely test your web app without worrying about clearing cache, extensions …

Installation

Using pypi repository:

$> pip install tmpbrowse

Forking this repo:

$> python setup.py install
